roleset.name: inhabit a den, as in hibernation

example.name: den-v
example.text: Two of 7 males denned in rock cavities, 4 in brush thickets or mostly open beds, and 1 young male displayed no sign of denning.

example.name: den-n
example.text: Only pregnant female polar bears den for this protracted period of time , during which time they rely on fat stores for energy and sustenance .
example.arg: for this protracted period of time
during which time they rely on fat stores for energy and sustenance

roleset.note: DEN-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.
